ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue, the Red Death has sprung a dangerous trap, scattering our masked heroes through time. From the prehistoric era to the post-apocalyptic future, the Shadow, Green Hornet, Peter Cannon, Miss Fury, and others face dinosaurs, murderous masqueraders, and mutants! Along the way, they uncover the terrible truth about the Red Death.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A/Reg | Regular Cover | Butch Guice & Alex Guimaraes | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Jae Lee & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Gabriel Hardman & Jordan Boyd | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Colton Worley | 4 | E/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Butch Guice | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jae Lee | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 7 | H/LE | Ultra-Rare Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Cover, Limited to 50 | Jae Lee | 8 | I/LE | Ultra-Rare Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Cover, Limited to 50 | Gabriel Hardman | 9 |
